item.description:
Know where you'll be at midnight on New Year's Eve? You probably have an idea (and if you said "Home, watching the ball drop", you're not alone).

But... how about at dinnertime?  Hmm... No firm plans for the last real meal of the year...?

Never fear! It's SSDOMG to the rescue once again!

Well, it's not exactly *all* of SSDOMG, but new member Susan Soumah has kindly volunteered to coordinate an informal get-together for any members who are interested in going out... and getting home before 1:00 AM. Members and their guests are welcome to join her at Gourmet Oriental in Weymouth at 6:30 PM on New Year's Eve for a year-ending evening of fun, friendship and fried rice.

Special Note: SSDOMG is not really putting together or coordinating this event. Susan volunteered to do the work involved and give anyone who was interested the chance to get together on New Year's Eve without having to stay out until midnight. If you join her, please let her know that her efforts are appreciated.

Our normal event fees will not apply.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Gourmet Oriental
Monday, December 31st, 2012 @ 6:30 PM 
625 Washington St. 
Weymouth, MA
(781) 337-8008

Event Host: Susan Soumah

Guests: Allowed

Price Range: Moderate. Prices here are pretty much in line with other Chinese restaurants in the area.

Event Fee: None! Pay only for what you order, plus tax and tip!

RSVP Deadline: Sunday, December 30th at 6:00 PM. Changes to your RSVP made after this time may not be seen by the Event Host.
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet at the host station. If you arrive after 6:30, ask for the Meetup table!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Eve: Got Dinner Plans?
